price: Hayır! Eğer son vermezse, elbette perçeminden yakalayıp sürükleriz.
arabic: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمۡ يَنتَهِ لَنَسۡفَعَۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: kallā la-in lam yantahi lanasfaʿan bil-nāṣiyati
